unnormalised: FYI, the Minimum Wages Act of 1948 mandates min. wage rates and can be enforced if employees aren't being paid as per the law; Adv. Sharma can provide more specific guidance.
normalised: For your information, the Minimum Wages Act of one thousand nine hundred and forty eight mandates minimum wage rates and can be enforced if employees aren't being paid as per the law; Advocate Sharma can provide more specific guidance.
